channel.title: Not enough time to step up with royal blood
channel.description:
#### What happened? This is known bug and i think it was already reported but still not fixed. I just wanted to remind the developers about it. Sometimes there is literally no time to step up to become king as royal. The message like "No royalty stepped up..." appears almost instantly and people can't react to that.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
#### Steps to reproduce:
#### Comments: This usually appears in lategame, never seen this in first few days.

item.title: Not enough time to step up with royal blood
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
What happened?

This is known bug and i think it was already reported but still not fixed. I just wanted to remind the developers about it.
Sometimes there is literally no time to step up to become king as royal. The message like “No royalty stepped up…” appears almost instantly and people can’t react to that.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Steps to reproduce:

Comments:

This usually appears in lategame, never seen this in first few days.

Read full topic
item.source: Not enough time to step up with royal blood
